Articles.Content:
I would like a mod that brings back the 0.90 aerodynamics. very simple, leave all new parts working, just with new values.

I hope to see this soon.

-jake9039.

Doesn't need a mod.

Turn on use spherical model in alt-f12 -> physics->drag.
ok. I will try as soon as I see it.
Also, I believe checking the "Drag uses acceleration instead of force" (the wording may vary slightly) box will also make it feel more like 0.90 aero.
